Y2 Mulan Production: Evening Arrangements for
Tuesday 17th June
We are very excited to perform our Y2 production of Mulan on Tuesday 17thJune 2014 at 6.30pm. Please note the following:
All Year 2 students will remain at school at the end of the day on Tuesday and have an early dinner (provided by the school) with their year group. They will then prepare for their 6.30pm performance.
All Year 2 students must be collected by a known adult, from their classroom, at 7.45pm on Tuesday evening. No transport home will be provided.
